description.line1: When we say team, we mean family, here at Internxt we learn from
description.line2: each other and try to give the best of ourselves everyday to
description.line3: develop amazing products designed with people at the center.

TeamSection.title: Internxt Leadership

bio.line1: Innovation is profoundly changing the way business works as customers increasingly demand secure solutions.
bio.line2: BlackBerry can help Internxt assess Encryption, Infrastructural vulnerabilities, Authentication and Data leak prevention.

bio.line1: Startups are most productive when they can spend most of their time building.
bio.line2: Y Combinators goal is to create an environment where we can focus exclusively on building products and talking to users on how to improve.

bio.line1: Juan Roig is known for being the owner of Mercadona, one of the biggest European corporations.
bio.line2: Internxt will receive the strategic help required to take Internxt to the next level. Lanzadera will also help Internxt cover any funding needs.

bio.line1: 500 Startups is one of the most active venture capital firms in the world and has commited over $454M in investment globally.
bio.line2: 500 Startups have chosen Internxt as one of the top SAAS startups worldwide.

TeamSection.quote: We believe that what humanity can achieve is extraordinary. We want to become a force of positive change that pushes society towards a better, brighter future. To do so, we are completely reengineering the status quo of a variety of industries, through the application of innovation in a way that’s coherent.
